ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectCertificate of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-56 TransCanada Keystone Pipeline GP Ltd.
PrecisOrder approving the issuance by the National Energy Board of Certificate of Public Convenience and Necessity OC-56 to TRANSCANADA KEYSTONE PIPELINE GP LTD for the construction and operation of the Canadian portion of the KEYSTONE XL PIPELINE PROJECT.
